text:
Producer!
Can I talk to you about the next day off~?

My usual fishmonger, the owner's wife fell ill
and they're having a tough time.
They always prepare delicious fish for me...
I'm thinking of offering to help~...

The fishmonger in the shopping district?
They're always so lively, calling out to customers.

Yeah, that's the one!
Hearing about them makes me feel better too!

Then, next time,
Kogane will be the one to cheer up passersby.
